version_description: We wanted to make your app experience better than ever, so we alleviated the usage hiccups that were getting in the way. If you are happy with your app experience, please give us a positive rating in the app store. If you have encountered any issues or have questions, please send us an e-mail. (apps@dw.com)

We wanted to make your app experience better than ever, so we alleviated the usage hiccups that were getting in the way. If you are happy with your app experience, please give us a positive rating in the app store. If you have encountered any issues or have questions, please send us an e-mail. (apps@dw.com)

We wanted to make your app experience better than ever:
• Portrait mode (tablet): The app is now available in portrait mode
• Big picture: The pictures in articles can be enlarged
If you are happy with your app experience, please give us a positive rating in the app store. If you have encountered any issues or have questions, please send us an e-mail. (apps@dw.com)

We wanted to make your app experience better than ever:
• Portrait mode (tablet): The app is now available in portrait mode
• Big picture: The pictures in articles can be enlarged
• Bug fixes
If you are happy with your app experience, please give us a positive rating in the app store. If you have encountered any issues or have questions, please send us an e-mail. (apps@dw.com)

You can now access all of DW's special coverage of the 2017 German federal elections on the start page of the DW app. Stay up-to-date on all the issues with #GermanyDecides, and find out why this election will affect Europe and the world.

There are also many other improved features that are included with this update. If you like the app, please rate us on the App Store. If you have any questions or issues please just send us an e-mail to app@dw.com.

You can now access all of DW's special coverage of the 2017 German federal elections on the start page of the DW app. Stay up-to-date on all the issues with #GermanyDecides, and find out why this election will affect Europe and the world.

There are also many other improved features that are included with this update. If you like the app, please rate us on the App Store. If you have any questions or issues please just send us an e-mail to app@dw.com.

The DW App has been updated with new features that make it more comfortable for offline use.  The new offline mode is an intelligent tool that delivers DW content without an internet connection. You can also select your favorite content from your bookmark list or from a series of categories as well as keep track of downloads and manage your content. With the DW App you are always connected with comprehensive and reliable news coverage.

The DW App has been updated with new features that make it more comfortable for offline use.  The new offline mode is an intelligent tool that delivers DW content without an internet connection. You can also select your favorite content from your bookmark list or from a series of categories as well as keep track of downloads and manage your content. With the DW App you are always connected with comprehensive and reliable news coverage.

We are constantly looking for ways to give you the best user experience possible. This update will make your viewing experience easier and more enjoyable by adding the channel selection menu to the main navigation bar.
With the DW app, you will always be up-to-date on the latest international news. If you like the app, please rate us on the App Store. If you have any questions or issues please just send us an e-mail to app@dw.com.

We are constantly working to improve your app experience.

This update is especially useful for people in countries where unbiased news and free speech is not guaranteed.

Do you like the new addition? We would love for you to rate us in the app store. If you have any problems or questions, just send an e-mail to app@dw.com.

This update will make it even easier for you get the news and information you want. Specifically:
The app now supports Dynamic Type, letting you change the font size.
If you like the app, please rate us on the App Store. If you have any questions or issues, please just send us an e-mail to app@dw.com.
This release fixes crashes that may have occured for some users.
